entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 9:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
